layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x70
  LayoutNGBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x70
    LayoutNGBlockFlow {BODY} at (25,25) size 750x20 [color=#FFFFFF] [bgcolor=#000080]
